verses.name: 2 Chronicles 15:1
verses.text: And the Spirit of God came upon Azariah the son of Oded:

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 15:2
verses.text: And he went out to meet Asa, and said unto him, Hear ye me, Asa, and all Judah and Benjamin; The Lord is with you, while ye be with him; and if ye seek him, he will be found of you; but if ye forsake him, he will forsake you.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 15:3
verses.text: Now for a long season Israel hath been without the true God, and without a teaching priest, and without law.
